citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:40AM on 13-
June-2024. The inspectors made contact with the facility representative whom stated no one was available for inspection
today. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
Additional Inspectors:
William Janecke, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:40AM on 13-
June-2024. The inspectors made contact with the facility representative whom stated no one was available for inspection 
today. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and 
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
William Janecke, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section
